description: A large garbage dump located in the basement of Building C in Caesar's research facility. Connected by numerous trash chutes throughout the building, this area serves as a disposal site for waste from the experiments. Momonosuke was trapped here for approximately ten days after falling down a chute while escaping in his dragon form.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Falls into the Waste Container
keyEvents.description: Luffy tumbles down into the garbage dump where he will discover Momonosuke.
keyEvents.significance: Sets the stage for one of the most important character meetings in the Punk Hazard arc.

keyEvents.title: Momonosuke Appears in Dragon Form
keyEvents.description: Luffy encounters the small pink dragon Momonosuke who has been trapped in this location for ten days.
keyEvents.significance: The debut location for Momonosuke's character and the setting where Luffy learns about the artificial Devil Fruit.

statusHistory.reason: Location is operational as part of Caesar's research facility

description: The SAD production room located in Building D of the Third Research Institute. This is where Caesar Clown manufactures SAD, the key chemical component used to create SMILE artificial Devil Fruits for Doflamingo. The room becomes the battleground for the intense fight between Smoker and Vergo.

keyEvents.title: Smoker vs Vergo Battle Intensifies
keyEvents.description: The fierce battle between Vice Admiral Smoker and Vergo continues in the SAD production room.
keyEvents.significance: Site of one of the major battles in the Punk Hazard arc, showcasing Vergo's superior Haki abilities.

statusHistory.reason: Room is functional during the battle

description: The largest section of the Third Research Institute, serving as the central hub. Contains research equipment, Caesar's garrison, and the Biscuits Room where giant children were kept. This building becomes a dangerous battleground as Monet uses her snow powers to create deadly blizzards.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Confronts Monet
keyEvents.description: Monet creates a deadly blizzard in Building B, and after wounding Robin, faces off against Zoro.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Zoro's intimidation of Monet takes place, one of the memorable moments of the arc.

statusHistory.reason: Building is operational during the escape attempt

description: A massive laboratory complex on Punk Hazard's frozen side, originally built by Vegapunk for the World Government. After being abandoned, it was taken over by Caesar Clown for his illegal experiments. The facility has five sections (A, B, C, D, and R) connected by protective gates, and contains various laboratories, production rooms, and holding cells.

keyEvents.title: Momonosuke's Flashback in the Facility
keyEvents.description: Flashback reveals Momonosuke's capture and imprisonment in Caesar's research facility.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the dark nature of the experiments conducted in this facility.

keyEvents.title: Vegapunk's Artificial Devil Fruit Discovered
keyEvents.description: Momonosuke discovers Vegapunk's abandoned artificial Devil Fruit in a secret room within the facility.
keyEvents.significance: The facility is revealed to house one of Vegapunk's most significant failed experiments.

statusHistory.reason: Facility operational under Caesar Clown's control
